verses.roman:
pitā me pūjayām āsa
suhṛt-sambandhi-bāndhavān
mahārha-vāso-'laṅkāraiḥ
śayyāsana-paricchadaiḥ

synonyms: pitā—father; me—my; pūjayām āsa—worshiped; suhṛt—his friends; sambandhi—immediate relations; bāndhavān—and other family members; mahā—very; arha—valuable; vāsaḥ—with clothing; alaṅkāraiḥ—and jewelry; śayyā—with beds; āsana—thrones; paricchadaiḥ—and other furniture.
translation: My father honored his friends, family and in-laws with priceless clothing and jewelry and with royal beds, thrones and other furnishings.
